name: Slider Puzzle (Lil Cthulhu)
description:
Fill rows of blocks to gain points in this fun little puzzle game. Made with Godot v3.5. The game will be available Google Play Store soon! The game is optimized for the use on mobile phones :)

Happy playing and feel free to leave a comment.

Control: Click on a block and move it around with your mouse. Touch input is also supported.
